Posts.EditableText: Is this function still working on quest: GetObject? How does it work? I want to create an object using the script "Create an object"....
Posts.HTML: Is this function still working on quest: GetObject? How does it work? I want to create an object using the script "Create an object"....

Posts.EditableText:
As far as I know, it still works:

[code:22m29yxq]      create ("foo")
      o = GetObject("foo")
      msg(o)[/code:22m29yxq]
yields: 

Object: foo

(create("foo") is what you get if you add "Create an Object" with name "foo")
Posts.HTML:
As far as I know, it still works:

      create ("foo")
      o = GetObject("foo")
      msg(o)

yields:

Object: foo

(create("foo") is what you get if you add "Create an Object" with name "foo")
